languages.text: {n}Вам требуется время, чтобы разобрать хриплые, шепелявые слова.{/n} "Катарина, душа моя... Белый амасек к фруктам?... Да, душа моя, да... Дети опять озорничают... Где ты, Катарина?" {n}Слабый голос старика пронизан тоской и нежностью.{/n}

{n}It takes you a second to make sense of his hoarse lisp:{/n} "Quatharina, love... White amasec and fruits? Of course, love... The children are making mischief again... Quatharina, where are you?" {n}The old man's frail voice is laden with tenderness and longing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам требуется время, чтобы разобрать хриплые, шепелявые слова.{/n} "Катарина, душа моя... Белый амасек к фруктам?... Да, душа моя, да... Дети опять озорничают... Где ты, Катарина?" {n}Слабый голос старика пронизан тоской и нежностью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It takes you a second to make sense of his hoarse lisping.{/n} "Quatharina, love... White amasec and fruits? Of course, love... The children are making mischief again... Quatharina, where are you?" {n}The old man's frail voice is laden with tenderness and longing.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼の舌足らずな発音を理解するのに数秒かかった。{/n}「クアサリナ、愛する人よ…白いアマセックと果物？分かった…。子供たちがまたいたずらをしている。クアサリナ、どこだ？」{n}老人のか細い声には優しさと切望がこもっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes you a second to make sense of his hoarse lisp:{/n} "Quatharina, love... White amasec and fruits? Of course, love... The children are making mischief again... Quatharina, where are you?" {n}The old man's frail voice is laden with tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の舌足らずな発音を理解するのに数秒かかった。{/n}「クアサリナ、愛する人よ…白いアマセックと果物？分かった…。子供たちがまたいたずらをしている。クアサリナ、どこだ？」{n}老人のか細い声には優しさと切望がこもっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}你花了几秒钟时间，才勉强听出他沙哑而含混不清的话。{/n}“奎莎莉娜，亲爱的……艾玛赛克酒和水果放哪去了？没问题，亲爱的……孩子们又在胡闹了……奎莎莉娜，你在哪呢？”{n}老人虚弱的声音中充满了温柔与渴切。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes you a second to make sense of his hoarse lisp:{/n} "Quatharina, love... White amasec and fruits? Of course, love... The children are making mischief again... Quatharina, where are you?" {n}The old man's frail voice is laden with tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你花了几秒钟时间，才勉强听出他沙哑而含混不清的话。{/n}“奎莎莉娜，亲爱的……艾玛赛克酒和水果放哪去了？没问题，亲爱的……孩子们又在胡闹了……奎莎莉娜，你在哪呢？”{n}老人虚弱的声音中充满了温柔与渴切。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tardas un segundo en entender su ronco ceceo.{/n} «Quatharina, amor... ¿Amasec blanco y frutas? Por supuesto, amor... Los niños están haciendo travesuras otra vez... Quatharina, ¿dónde estás?». {n}La voz frágil del anciano está cargada de ternura y anhelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes you a second to make sense of his hoarse lisp:{/n} "Quatharina, love... White amasec and fruits? Of course, love... The children are making mischief again... Quatharina, where are you?" {n}The old man's frail voice is laden with tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tardas un segundo en entender su ronco ceceo.{/n} «Quatharina, amor... ¿Amasec blanco y frutas? Por supuesto, amor... Los niños están haciendo travesuras otra vez... Quatharina, ¿dónde estás?». {n}La voz frágil del anciano está cargada de ternura y anhelo.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du brauchst kurz, um sein heiseres Lispeln zu verstehen.{/n} "Quatharina, mein Herz ... Weißer Amasec und Obst? Natürlich, mein Herz ... Die Kinder treiben schon wieder Unfug ... Quatharina, wo seid Ihr?" {n}Die brüchige Stimme des alten Mannes ist voller Zärtlichkeit und Sehnsucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes you a second to make sense of his hoarse lisp:{/n} "Quatharina, love... White amasec and fruits? Of course, love... The children are making mischief again... Quatharina, where are you?" {n}The old man's frail voice is laden with tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du brauchst kurz, um sein heiseres Lispeln zu verstehen.{/n} "Quatharina, mein Herz ... Weißer Amasec und Obst? Natürlich, mein Herz ... Die Kinder treiben schon wieder Unfug ... Quatharina, wo seid Ihr?" {n}Die brüchige Stimme des alten Mannes ist voller Zärtlichkeit und Sehnsucht.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Il vous faut un certain temps pour comprendre ce qu'il dit.{/n} « Quatharina, mon amour... De l'amasec blanc et des fruits ? Bien sûr, mon amour... Les enfants font encore des bêtises... Quatharina, où es-tu ? » {n}La voix fragile du vieil homme est pleine de tendresse et de désir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes you a second to make sense of his hoarse lisp:{/n} "Quatharina, love... White amasec and fruits? Of course, love... The children are making mischief again... Quatharina, where are you?" {n}The old man's frail voice is laden with tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous faut un certain temps pour comprendre ce qu'il dit.{/n} « Quatharina, mon amour... De l'amasec blanc et des fruits ? Bien sûr, mon amour... Les enfants font encore des bêtises... Quatharina, où es-tu ? » {n}La voix fragile du vieil homme est pleine de tendresse et de désir.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Boğuk ve peltek konuşmasını anlaman biraz zaman alıyor.{/n} "Quatharina, aşkım... Beyaz amasek ve meyve mi istiyorsun? Tabii canım... Çocuklar yine yaramazlık peşinde... Quatharina, neredesin?" {n}İhtiyarın çelimsiz sesi, şefkat ve özlemle dolu.{/n}
